ygData.subject: Re: Stacking & RPing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Also, for more recent variants of this, if yer a comedy fan, and watch whoppie in sister Act 2, she does something similar. Alternating between about 5
ygData.messageBody:
>Fair enough, but what about if you're playing one song on some instrument &
>singing the lyrics and then add a line a two from another song that happens
>to be in the same key? (If you're old enough to recall Live Aid, I'm
>referring to what U2 did singing Ruby Tuesday over Bad)


Also, for more recent variants of this, if yer a comedy fan, and watch
whoppie in sister Act 2, she does something similar. Alternating between
about 5 different songs, just singing them all to one beat, that merges em
rather nicely.
